channel.title: Marps on Benjamin Rizkowsky Resume
channel.description: Recent content in Marps on Benjamin Rizkowsky Resume

item.description: Resilient scalable build systems or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love AWS What do we need to do? Build a resilient infrastructure platform Orchestrator: Jenkins + EKS Filesystem: EFS Load balancer: Nginx ingress Put Jenkins on top of infra Talk about the ideology and other concerns Questions Why do we need to do better than running Jenkins on EC2? Jenkins does not support native high availability as a feature Why?
